attributes.action: Secure the continued broadcast of Neighbours on BBC 1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On Thursday 26th April the BBC announced the uncertain future of Neighbours on BBC 1 due to disputes over funding. 

Neighbours has been broadcast on BBC 1 since 1986 and it is imperative that it stays this way for future generations to enjoy. It is the second most popular programme on terrestrial daytime television and it is an important aspect of British Culture. 

The government should immediately secure the broadcast of Neighbours on BBC 1 to ensure the continued integrity of the BBC.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
